meanings.definition: Relating to or caused by protozoa.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the protozoal infection in the pond water.
meanings.sent2: The vet treated the cat for a protozoal disease.
meanings.sent3: The protozoal creatures in the microscope seemed to be having a tiny party.
meanings.sent4: The protozoal outbreak spread through the community like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The protozoal nature of the organism made it difficult to eradicate.

meanings.sent1: The protozoal research team discovered a new species in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The zoo displayed a fascinating exhibit on protozoal life.
meanings.sent3: The protozoal exhibit at the museum was surprisingly popular with visitors.
meanings.sent4: The protozoal characteristics of the organism were unlike anything seen before.
meanings.sent5: The protozoal environment provided a unique habitat for various species.
